game.name: Ski Hero
game.description:
Does skating sport excites you? Is your dream of skiing on the ice mountain using your skates? Luckily, we have come a cool skating game “Ski Hero” where you have to control a character who is determined to ski down the mountain. We are pretty sure that this brand new sports game will not let you down no matter what kind of skating desires you have on your mind. Do not forget to avoid the obstacles when you are on your way!

The beautiful winter Christmas landscape combined with a wonderful family-friendly theme and interactive tutorial of the game can keep you engrossed for hours. You will surely fall in love with it especially if you are a true fan of winter ski free Xmas games. The primary objective is to help character to stay as long as possible on the ice while skiing down the slope. Get ready to avoid different kinds of obstacles like Christmas trees, barrows and penguin!

You will be able to go down faster after scoring 100 points on the screen in this simple yet fun html5 game. Keep collecting more flags to earn extra points. All you need to do is just hover your mouse to move your character left and right in this endless-run game. Be prepared to make your body soar fast above the cute and lovely white snowy surface and become the biggest Ski Hero of your area! Put your cognitive skill to test to win in this free physics game!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Ski Hero at atmegame.com ! We have selected this  games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: HOLD LEFT TO GO LEFT, HOLD RIGHT SCREEN TO GO RIGHT
game.webControlKeys: KEEP PRESS LEFT CLICK TO MOVE THE SKIER
